text: “xo phracea khxng kha phraxngkh thæcring phraxngkh thrng di prathan xanac bang swn kæ kha phraxngkh læa thrng sxn kha phraxngkh hı ru kar thanay fan phra phuthrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin phraxngkh pen phu khumkhrxng kha phraxngkh thang nı lok dun ya læa xa khi reaa h khx phraxngkh thrng hı kha phraxngkh tay nı sphaph pen phu nxbnxm læa thrng hı kha phraxngkh rwm xyu nı hmu khn di thanghlay”
